_header: I would fain be a clerk / But yet it is a strange work
_description: The Schoolboy’s Lament — six 5-line stanzas (aaaab) with refrain, ‘What avaylith it me thowgh I say nay’, and burden: ‘Hay hay by this day / What avayleth it me thowgh I say nay’

BodLauMis601.Transcription:
munday in þe morning y vp riseat sene aclock at my deuiseto
                    scole y must in eny wyse

OxfBal354.First Lines:
I wold ffayn be a clarkebut yet his is a strange
                    werke…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…ffor if he were dede I wold not careWhat vaylith me thowgh I
                    say nayExplicit
